_sText:
IS_PIT, made by SKAR.

---

An Ice Skating map based on The Pit levels from the Mortal Kombat series.
Best played with sv_airaccelerate 300.

---

Ice Skating is still a very new maptype, "ice skating" works like airstrafing.
You use A and D to strafe while at the same time turning in that same direction to gain speed.

---

You spawn with a knife in an invisible box. After 3 seconds the box will break and you will be able to skate. It is recommended that you dont jump or duck while in the box because you might end up not hitting the boost on the ground properly.
In the center of the map you will find a flashbang which will respawn every 10 seconds.
After 2 minutes you will be unable to iceskate and will have to walk normally, this is so the round doesnt last too long.

---

Custom skybox by Karatekaefer

---

Please enjoy!
